title: so Riot won't let Janna go Mid because her wave clear is to safe..
body:
unlike those other champions who need to risk themselves to farm, I wish I could punch Riot in the face, get some sense into them. so when they lie they at least sound somewhat smart..

this is why people hate playing support, because unlike any other game, in this one, supports get shit on non stop.

{{champion:40}} Mid, let's test it shall we?

Q the entire world can avoid
W is a nuke - other real laners have 3 skills that nuke
E is a strong shield
R is anything but OP when looking at all the crazy abilities new champions have

and there you go.. you got another strong useless Mid laner, that can only farm well like most, have a single reliable dmg skill. has a very strong shield and a heal that can go either way in team fights.

oh no! {{champion:40}} Mid is so scary!!, she is never allowed to be viable, because she would be broken, unlike those other super healthy picks we got right now
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

http://68.media.tumblr.com/2c138377020c17ca0aa423b9ee23acf3/tumblr_nvikepxUQR1uf7g6ho1_1280.png
